Response body contains access token
Log token for debugging
Handle error if status code is not 200

testcase.name: Status code is 200
Response body contains access token
Log token for debugging
Handle error if status code is not 200

testcase.name: Login - User: Refresh token retrieved and stored

testcase.name: Logout - User: Logout request successful

testcase.name: User retrieval test - User ID is set

testsuite.name: Config Management / Update Client Props / 1 - Login - Admin

testcase.name: Status code is 200
Access token is present in response
Access token is valid

testsuite.name: Config Management / Update Client Props / 2 - Client Info - Admin

testcase.name: Status code is 200
Response contains client array with at least one item
First client in array has a valid UUID
CLIENT_UUID is set correctly

testcase.name: Status code is 204 for successful update
